scripts.build-web:cont: rimraf dist/public && webpack --mode development --env development --config webpack.webapp.config.js --watch
scripts.build-web:dev: rimraf dist/public && webpack --mode development --env development --config webpack.webapp.config.js
scripts.build:dev: npm run build-web:dev && npm run build-server:dev
scripts.build-web:prod: rimraf dist/public && webpack --mode production --env production --config webpack.webapp.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run build-web:prod && npm run build-server:prod
